code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBar=()=>{const[searchQuery,setSearchQuery]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSearch=e=>{e.preventDefault();navigate(`/search?q=${searchQuery}`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSearch,className:"d-flex justify-content-center mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:searchQuery,onChange:e=>setSearchQuery(e.target.value),placeholder:"Search for apartments",className:"form-control me-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Search"})]});};export default SearchBar;
